document_data.name: Stonekeep Concourse
document_data.mainbody: '''Stonekeep Concourse''' was a major street that crossed the majority of [[Ravens Bluff]] from north to south, beginning in the [[Tentowers]] neighborhood, passing through the [[Mortonbrace]] neighborhood, [[The Skymbles]], [[Shadystreets]], and came to the end in [[Pumpside]].
document_data.Geography: Stonekeep Concourse began on [[Falyern Way]] in the Tentowers neighborhood and moved south in a straight line, crossing [[Turnhelm Street]], [[Amandagar Street]], [[Fireleap Lane]], [[Melmaster Street]], [[Hawk Passage]], [[Shalastra's Ride]], [[Griffon Trail]], [[Raven Way]], [[Bowshot Street]], [[Selgaunt Street]], [[Olorin's Lane]], [[Iymiril Lane]], [[Ulgrin's Ride]], [[Jossil Street]], [[White Wyrm Way]], [[Thavverdasz Way]], and [[Riverview Road]]. Then, the street veered southeast and passed the [[Ravensbridge]]. Following its entry into the [[Shutters]] neighborhood, Stonekeep Concourse ran a few more blocks in a straight line south, crossing [[Karen Street]], [[Hammerstone Street]], [[Dover's Run]], and ended on [[Conant Court]] in the Pumpside neighborhood, just in front of the [[House of War]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[House of War]], the temple dedicated to [[Tempus]].
*[[Myriad's Fencind School]], between Melmaster Street and Hawk Passage.
*[[Scladdles House]], on the crossing with Turnhelm Street â€“ the home of [[Remy LeBeau]], a [[hin]] adventurer in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Spath Investigations]] on Bowshot Street, private investigator's office run by retired adventurer [[Tevlo Spath]] in the 14{{th}} century DR.
*[[The Last Jack]], a quiet inn located on the riverside where Stonekeep Concourse and Karen Court crossed.
*[[The Salty Dog (Ravens Bluff)|The Salty Dog]], a rough and tumble sailors' tavern facing the Ravensbridge.
